Please remember that Butterfield will never email you a link or send you an SMS asking for your personal information, such as online banking credentials or passwords. If you receive a suspicious e-mail or SMS, please forward it to phishing@butterfieldgroup.com Always access Butterfield Online through the link on our website or by typing the address www.butterfieldonline.comdirectly into your browser.
